#Background
    **Language Family** : Kartvelian / Karto-Zan / Georgian
    
    
#Phonology

##Consonants 
      
      ###Stops
          [pʰ]  [p']  [b]  [tʰ]  [t']  [d]  [kʰ]  [k']  [g] [q]
      ###Fricatives
          [v]  [s]  [z]  [ʃ]  [ʒ]  [x]  [ɣ]  [h]
      ###Affricates 
          [ts]  [ts']  [dz]  [tʃ]  [tʃ']  [dʒ]
      ###Sonorants
          [m]  [n]  [l]  [r/ɾ]   

##Vowels
  
        [i]  [ɛ]  [ɑ]  [ɔ]  [u]

# Lenition
    
    [v] --> /w/ / in coda and C_
    [v] --> [f] / _C[devoiced]
    
    [v] can glide to /w/ at the end of syllables and after consonants, and [v] is also sometimes realizes as [f] before voiceless consonants 
    
    [q] --> /χ/ / V_V
    
    [q] can sometimes soften to a uvular fricative in between vowels
